entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Breton 09:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late this morning. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:46 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 06:46 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
